column4: How can I write CTRL-Z to my application at the terminal without having to shove my app to the backgound?
How can I write CTRL-Z to my application at the terminal without having to shove my app to the backgound?
Ctrl-Z sends SIGSTOP, what are you trying to do? :-
I want to send CTRL-Z to a modem terminal application, the modems outputstream depends on that character if you are tring to send/wite a message using the AT command at+cmg[ws], kanliot I on Bash
